description: MainActivity class for an Android TV app, managing fragment hosting and back navigation.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity for Android TV, handling fragment management and navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, and loads the initial fragment if first launch.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key events, delegating focus navigation if needed.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Handles back navigation, popping fragment backstack or finishing activity.
